casebody.data:
PORTER COUNTY SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
Brooks C.C. WILLMON, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-CT-1699 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed March 19, 2019

Unpublished Memorandum Decision

Affirmed in part, reversed in part. Remanded for further proceedings.
